---
category: news
title: "Spiking neurons from tunable Gaussian heterojunction transistors"
excerpt: "Designing high performance, scalable, and energy efficient spiking neural networks remains a challenge. Here, the authors utilize mixed-dimensional dual-gated Gaussian heterojunction transistors from single-walled carbon nanotubes and monolayer MoS2 to realize simplified spiking neuron circuits."
publishedDateTime: 2020-03-26T10:27:00Z
